definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_random_patch"><field name="tries">3</field><field name="xzSpread">2</field><field name="ySpread">2</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to place up to 10 cactus columns</comment><value name="feature"><block type="placed_feature_inline"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We use the extra placement to make sure that the cacti only generate in valid spots</comment><value name="feature"><block type="feature_block_column_simple" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This represents a single cactus column</comment><value name="height"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">1</field><field name="max">4</field></block></value><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:SaltBlock</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="placement"><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><comment pinned="false" h="94" w="179">We then move the patches at the highest non-air block, so that they generate on the surface. </comment></block></statement></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_rarity"><field name="rarity">5</field><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><comment pinned="false" h="94" w="179">We then move the patches at the highest non-air block, so that they generate on the surface. </comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the patches don't generate outside of the current biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
